wikipedia_page.main: William Valentine Wood worked for much of his life on the London, Midland and Scottish Railway (LMS), rising to become its President. He was known for his ability with numbers.

response: * January 14 – William Valentine Wood, president of the London, Midland and Scottish Railway 1941-8 (d. 1959).
* August 26 - William Valentine Wood, President of the London, Midland and Scottish Railway 1941-8 (born 1883).
* William Valentine Wood (1883–1959), President of the London, Midland and Scottish Railway, 1941–1947
